attributes.action: SAVE OUR GREEN BELT IN IRLAM AND WORSLEY, MANCHESTER
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: help us stop the proposed Salford City Council plans to turn Irlam and Worsley Barton Moss Green Belt in Salford, Manchester, into an Industrial Estate.  Salford City Councils Core Consultation Strategy needs to be contested before 15 January 2010 to stop the destruction of beautiful green land, farm land and a golf course on which much wildlife exists and has done for centuries
